group.name: info
group.comment: NOTE: Locstrings are shared between the American and German mortars since they are basically the same thing. Separate them if their abilities change or we want more historical/equipment centric descriptions.

group.name: state_tree_references
group.comment: State tree that increases the EXPERIENCE that this entity grants to enemies when its dead.
